Description: Papyrus document with 5 lines of Coptic text written against the fibres on one side and 19 lines on the other side, also written against the fibres. Mounted with EA 75307.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (118097) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/118097)
Clackson 2008 / It is our father who writes: orders from the monastery of Apollo at Bawit
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: P.Bawit Clackson 89; P.Bawit Clackson 50
